main_text.sentence: The St group presented a moderate increase in permeability (Asp/plasma ratio: 0.31 Â± 0.04), it has previously been reported that agar beads could alone be responsible for a moderate increase in permeability [19].
Increased BAL levels most likely indicate intrapulmonary overproduction and not increased permeability [33].
Intestinal permeability is measured by the sugar absorption test, as previously described [18].
The intestinal tight junctions between epithelial cells and permeability have been reviewed [37].
Long-term exposure also increases in mucosal permeability both in vivo and in vitro [111].
The mechanism behind this phenomenon might be that SEB increases permeability of the intestinal mucosa [6,13].
Lu et al also reported that SEB significantly increased colonic mucosal permeability in a mouse study [13].
For example, changes in the permeability of the intestinal barrier occurs with age with decreasing Peyer's patches [16].
Fibrin cleavage products may be detrimental for endothelial cell function, increasing permeability and promoting endothelial cell migration [36,41,42].
